data.title: PREVIEW: Voice Acting For Cartoons - With Lizzie Waterworth-Santo, Jo Ruiz & Keith Wickham!
data.text:
*Act On This members get access to the FULL 2 HOUR+ recording of this feature, in BOTH video and audio-only formats. CLICK HERE to grab your PREMIUM membership NOW!

Over the past 5 years I've voiced literally HUNDREDS of cartoon episodes for Netflix, Amazon Prime, and most recently CBeebies.

Whilst working on Tinpo for CBeebies I was cast alongside 3 of the greatest voice actors in the industry:

Lizzie Waterworth-Santo - the BAFTA-nominated voice of Horrid Henry, Keith Wickham, known for the voice of The Fat Controller in Thomas & Friends, and Joanna Ruiz, known for countless characters in shows like Dennis & Gnasher and Fireman Sam.

In this 2 HOUR+ chat, we look at how YOU can begin your journey into voice acting for cartoons, and members of Act On This jump on camera for some 1-2-1 career advice too!

During the broadcast, we discuss:

How Lizzie, Jo & Keith got into voice acting - and the countless shows they've worked on.

The first steps the team would take, if they were starting out again.

Why finding your niche is SO CRITICAL for success.

Voice agents - and how to get their attention.

The importance of word of mouth in the voice acting industry - and why you MUST network online and in-person.

How to use LinkedIn to find key players in the industry.

Why being funny helps a lot in the cartoon world.

Animation reels - how to make one and what should be on it.

Buying kit to practice voice acting - and why you don't have to spend a fortune.

Learning how to edit audio for FREE!

Not being afraid to fail.

Voice acting auditions - and getting ready for them.

Vocal health - and looking after your voice.

Why it's ALWAYS the right time to START!

Why you should never have your photo on, or near your voicereel.

Dubbing animation from a foreign language into English.

Experimenting with your voice to develop versatility.

The ONE THING the team wants every actor to know about voice acting.

And MUCH MUCH more!

Read to start your career in voice acting?

You better be!

---

Watch a PREVIEW of this broadcast above, then grab your PREMIUM membership to unlock the full chat!
